thread.title: ‘Straight Outta Compton’ Leads for Third Week
thread.title_full: ‘Straight Outta Compton’ Leads for Third Week - WSJ

author: wsjcom
title: ‘Straight Outta Compton’ Leads for Third Week
text:
The Christian drama “War Room” made a surprise bid for the box-office lead, Zac Efron’s music drama “We Are Your Friends” bombed spectacularly, and the N.W.A biopic “Straight Outta Compton” kept chugging along.
“Straight Outta Compton,” from Comcast Corp.’s Universal Pictures, topped the box office for the third straight week, bringing in $13.2 million at North American theaters over the weekend, according to studio estimates Sunday. The film, which has made $134.1 million in total, has continued to dominate August... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
